content:
{"name": "Meals on Wheels of Hillsborough County (HCMOW) ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Hillsborough  New Hampshire residents only 

*Due to a high volume of new participant inquiries, home delivered enrollment may take up to two weeks* Thank you for your interest in Meals on Wheels!﻿

-Standard service: one meal delivered each weekday (5 meals per week)

-Participants must be at home to receive meals, meals will not be left.

-Please request meals only when you are ready to receive them.

-Please make sure the intended recipient knows you are requesting meals on their behalf

-Feel free to call us with any questions: 603-424-9967", "email": "", "url": "https://www.hcmow.org/services", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(603) 424-9967", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors and people with disabilities"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "For homebound seniors"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}]}
